name: archer_api_upload_v1.0.0
summary: Upload samples to Archer and submit job via API

inputSpec.name: project_id
inputSpec.label: project id
inputSpec.help: project id where the fastq files are located

inputSpec.name: archer_password
inputSpec.label: archer password
inputSpec.help: archer password in Base64 Encoded format

inputSpec.name: protocol_id
inputSpec.label: protocol id
inputSpec.help: protocol id to be used for the job run on Archer

inputSpec.name: specific_folder
inputSpec.label: specific folder
inputSpec.help: folder name to provide if the folder name in the Dx project does not follow usual format

inputSpec.name: specific_path
inputSpec.label: specific path
inputSpec.help: folder path to provide if the fastq are not located in the usual path

outputSpec.name: archer_api_upload
outputSpec.label: array of archer upload output files
